Presentation.PageTitle: Use UCSF Profiles Data to Enhance Your Website

Param.Name: HTML
Param.p: Over two dozen UCSF websites and apps use data from UCSF Profiles. Users include the UCSF School of Medicine, UCSF Department of Surgery, and UCSF Directory.

ul.li: Covers over 10,000 members of the UCSF campus research community
Includes publications, photos, biographies, websites, etc.
Can be integrated into almost any kind of website

p.a: Join the UCSF Chatter Profiles Data Consumers group
